DOC.detailed_description: This `` best breast design '' measure effect new infant formula healthy term subject growth , body composition , tolerance safety include immune status , gut microbiota , early indicator ( marker ) disease . These marker explore could predict risk eczema allergic disease , evaluate marker influence early nutrition .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy term infant ( gestational age ≥ 37 ≤ 42 week ) 2 . Age ≤ 28 day 3 . Birth weight within normal range gestational age sex ( 3rd 90th percentile accord applicable growth chart ) 4 . Head circumference birth within normal range ( 3rd 90th percentile chart ) 5 . Chinese , Malay , Indian ethnicity 6 . Written inform consent parent ( ) 7 . Currently reside Singapore intention reside Singapore least next 2 year Exclusion criterion pregnant women/parents : 1 . Pregnant woman / mother currently participate participate ( clinical ) study involve investigational market product pregnancy and/or lactation . 2 . Pregnant woman / mother know suffer hepatitis B human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) 3 . Pregnant woman / mother know significant medical condition ( include pregnancy ) might interfere study know affect intrauterine growth ( include , limited : placenta previa , preeclampsia , eclampsia , gestational diabetes require insulin oral medication ) , per investigator 's clinical judgement 4 . Incapability parent comply study protocol Investigator 's uncertainty willingness ability parent comply protocol requirement Exclusion criterion subject : 5 . Infants know current previous illnesses/ condition intervention could interfere study ( growth ) , per investigator 's clinical judgement 6 . Infants know congenital disease malformation could interfere study ( e.g . gastrointestinal malformation , congenital immunodeficiency ) , per investigator 's clinical judgement 7 . Infants need feed special diet standard cow 's milkbased infant formula 8 . Infants receive infant formula , except infant formula give birth initial breastfeeding ( maximum 3 consecutive day ) 9 . Infants history current participation study involve investigational market product .
